0x09=Gallery
0x0a=Game Option

Lookup:Challenge
0x00=Execute Throw Escape (→ + HP/HK while being thrown) 5 times.
0x01=Execute Recovery Roll (LP+LK when knocked down) 5 times.
0x02=Crush the opponent's guard and defeat them.
0x03=Execute Guard Cancel Evasion (LP+LK while blocking) 5 times.
0x04=Execute Guard Cancel Blow Back (HP+HK while blocking) 5 times.
0x05=Beat an opponent who uses Guard Cancel Blow Back on all attacks.
0x06=Beat an opponent who uses Roll repeatedly.
0x07=Execute a combo that ends with a DM (Desperation Move/Super).
0x08=Combo: Normal > Command Normal > Special
0x09=Combo: Include MAX Mode Activation (i.e. LP > MAX Mode).
0x0a=Combo: Small jump normal > Normal > Special
0x0b=Combo: Include 4 MAX cancels (doable in MAX Mode).
0x0c=Use Crow Bites (→, ↓, → + LP/HP) to counter hit 5 times. 
0x0d=Combo: Do 50% damage.
0x0e=Beat Kyo-1, Kyo-2, Kusanagi, and Kyo Kusanagi.
0x0f=Beat Orochi Team (O. Yashiro, O. Shermie, O. Chris) and Goenitz.
0x10=Use ↓, ↓ + P to survive Clone Zero's DM.
0x11=Hit opponent w/ Overkill (↙, ↓, ↘, →, ↗, ↑, ↓ + P in air, close)
0x12=Combo: Include MAX Mode Activation and a MAX2 move.
0x13=Beat Krizalid.
0x14=Combo: Do 70% damage.
0x15=Using Kensou, whose health is gradually draining, beat 3 opponents.
0x16=Beat Clone Zero and Zero.
0x17=Combo: 20 hits without DMs (Supers), MAX, or MAX2.
0x18=Beat the opponent by finishing them with a DM. Invisible life bar.
0x19=Beat the opponent with 10 hits or less.
0x1a=Survive for 30 seconds. You can't block or attack.
0x1b=Beat the opponent while controls are inverted (up is down, etc).
0x1c=Avoid being hit by Choi's MAX2 3 times. You have 0 health.
0x1d=Beat Igniz and Omega Rugal.
0x1e=Use Vanessa's →, ↓, → + HP to reflect 5 fireballs.
0x1f=Use Seth's HP+HK Blow Back to interrupt Foxy's MAX2 3 times.
0x20=Mirror match: Beat the opponent.
0x21=Combo: Include a normal, command normal, special, DM, MAX, and MAX2
0x22=Combo: Include Kyo's ↓, ↘, → + LP 5 times.
0x23=K.O. opponent using the follow up on Ralf's MAX2.
0x24=Combo: Include EX Robert's ↓, ↘, → x 2 + K DM 3 times.
0x25=Combo: Include Andy's ↘ + LP 4 times.
0x26=Beat Krizalid and Igniz while controls are inverted.
0x27=Beat 6 opponents in 99 seconds.
0x28=Combo: K.O. opponent. Jump and Roll are disabled.
0x29=Use Jhun's ↓ + LK in air to stay in the air for 30 seconds by bouncing on the opponent.
0x2a=Combo: Normal > Command Normal > Special > DM > MAX
0x2b=Hit opponent w/ Overkill (↙, ↓, ↘, →, ↗, ↑, ↓ + P in air, close)
0x2c=Combo: K.O. opponent. 
0x2d=Beat Goenitz and Geese; only damaged when timer is multiple of 3.
0x2e=Survive attacks by blocking right as they hit.
0x2f=Parry opponent's attacks with Ryo's → + LK &/or ↘ + LK and counterattack to do damage until opponent is defeated.
0x30=Beat Krizalid, Clone Zero, Zero, Igniz, and Omega Rugal.
0x31=Beat Nightmare Geese.

Achievements.Title: K' Team
